headline: American Water Works Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: American Water Works (NYSE:AWK) reported 2025 results near the upper end of its expectations and reaffirmed its 2026 earnings outlook, while also providing updates on rate cases, capital investment, acquisitions, and its pending merger with Essential Utilities during its fourth quarter 2025 earnings

headline: American Water Works (AWK) Earnings Transcript
summary: John Griffith: Thank you, Aaron, and good morning, everyone.  You can see here an abbreviated list of some of our key financial and other accomplishments for the year and David and Cheryl will add to these in their remarks.  As we announced yesterday, we achieved 2025 financial results near the upper end of our expectations.

headline: American Water Works Grant Program Adds New Angle To Valuation Debate
summary: American Water Works Company (NYSE:AWK) has launched its 2026 Water and Environment Grant Program. The program invites community partners to apply for funding focused on clean water, conservation, and environmental education. The initiative extends the company’s role beyond core utility services into broader environmental stewardship and community support. For investors watching NYSE:AWK, this new grant program adds another layer to how the company engages with the communities it serves...
